answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Mike – I hope the following is helpful:
Attached – Job Description School IPM Coordinator:  Non-commercial applicator
Duncanville, TX – IPM Coordinator 
http://human-resources.duncanvilleisd.org/modules/groups/homepagefiles/cms/1622559/File/positions/IPM_Coordinator_Mtce.pdf 
San Francisco, CA – Integrated Pest Management Specialist
http://www.jobaps.com/SF/specs/classspecdisplay.asp?ClassNumber=3424 
Davis, CA - Integrated Pest Management Specialist
http://agency.governmentjobs.com/davis/default.cfm?action=viewclassspec&ClassSpecID=62550 
Seasonal Integrated Pest Management (IPM) and Conservation Crew Technician: Colorado
http://wfscjobs.tamu.edu/jobs/seasonal-integrated-pest-management-ipm-and-conservation-crew-technician-colorado/ 
Moore County, NC Schools - Area Maintenance Crew Leader/IPM Coordinator
http://www.ncmcs.org/cms/lib7/NC01001076/Centricity/Domain/25/JobDescriptions/Maintenance/Job%20Description%20-%20Area%20Maintenance%20Crew%20Leader%20IPM%20Coordinator%20120512.pdf 
Evaluate Your IPM Program Form
http://www.spcpweb.org/attachments/EvaluateYourIPMProgram.pdf 
Pam
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Corporate Partner Liaison
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Mike Calhoon
text: Does anyone have a job description for an IPM Coordinator that they would be willing to share??
title: Integrated Pest Management Coordinator
